text: niyata vasayenma karun musage janaya aturin keneku viya. namut ohu ovunata erehi va simava ikmava katayutu kaleya. tavada api ohuta nidhan vastu pirinæmuvemu. niyata vasayenma ehi yaturu saktimat kandayamak visin ita asiruven usulannak viya. oba udam novanu yæyi ohuge janaya ohuta pævasu avasthava sihipat karanu. niyata vasayenma allah udam vannan priya nokarayi
